data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the state of Sada access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sada, Mayotte
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help 1 new simple churches start among the 9,600 people in the state of Sada, Mayotte. One within reach of everyone living here.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 1066 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 9,600 people living in the state of Sada.
Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Sada who will make disciples who make disciples.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Sada, Mayotte a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Sada, Mayotte and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Sada. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;
